elements:
A massive book of martial might and magical mayhem for D&D 5e - 4 epic new classes, 30+ new subclasses, 30+ feats, and over 240 spells!.

KT-COLAL https://kibbles-compendium-of-legends-and-legacies.backerkit.com/hosted_preorders https://d1wgd08o7gfznj.cloudfront.net/uploads/gallery_images/97ce533a-75d3-4bb0-8f89-8ef09a431435/Hardcover_Icon_legacy_square_thumb.png KibblesTasty false false false true true false 2025 Source for unpublished/free material created by Kibbles' Tasty KTH https://www.kthomebrew.com/ https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5e7eab9fcc76e2321541f8b3/a18ba2dd-becb-48d9-baf3-744e25a20e87/Doggo512Icon.png?format=1500w KibblesTasty false false false true true false

KibblesTasty's homebrewed subclasses kept updated.

KTHSub https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1075167519919493120/1600760061/1500x500 KibblesTasty false false false true true false 20200118

KibblesTasty's homebrewed races kept updated.

KTHRac https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1075167519919493120/1600760061/1500x500 KibblesTasty false false false true true false 20200118

Forge armor, wield cannons, enchant swords, infuse potions... the power to innovate is in your hands! Magic item retrofitting, balance tweaks, streamlined mutations, and more!

KTHArt https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-LAEn6ZdC6lYUKhQ67Qk https://i.pinimg.com/736x/23/dc/9b/23dc9bd5c737fea75fb8ca20b9222957.jpg KibblesTasty false false false true true false 20200118

Read minds, manifest astral constructs, fling greatswords, enhance your allies and more!

KTH https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-LZSNMgmChWNGW979hrj https://i.imgur.com/mPLafBO.jpg KibblesTasty false false false true true false 20200118

Take to the field and crush your foes. Change the odds as a Tactician, or defy them as a Paragon. Ply your cunning as Packleader, or show your courage as a Chieftain. Make your companions look competent. They’ll thank you later.

KTHWarlord https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-LW4agTNJcbwe6kSv4H2 https://www.gmbinder.com/images/uIDE3wS.png KibblesTasty false false false true true false 20200118

Witches. Shamans. Oracles. The lost traditions are out there… and they are here. Explore Occult Rites and master your ancient Tradition. Wield new spells! Curse your foes or bind spirits to your call. Dark secrets await.

KTHOcc https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-M-WtrKeZNFdEXq0MKXw https://i.redd.it/iz4r201q7ik51.png KibblesTasty false false false true true false 20200118

One of the common things I see folks at my table and accross the D&D Community looking for all the time is spells that better fit elemental archetypes beyond fire. It feels as if the fire spell list was completed, and everything else got a few leftovers. This is the complete list that gives each element it's own buffet.

You can simple reflavor fire spells suit your needs - if that works for and your table, great! However, in my experience over the years of doing exactly that, it tends to rob the elements of the last vestige of unique flavor, subtle differences, and as consequent the world setting which should feel deep, mysterious, and magical, starts to feel more game like, more formulic.

In providing this wave of new spells and their possibilities, this document can help a world have that mystifying depth of magic that represents the true scope of elemental magic and the touch of the thousands of wizards that have come before leaving behind the research, a true basis and complete system of generic elemental magic.

KTHGS https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-MW5r6wBJTW_lOU6gLyU https://www.gmbinder.com/images/kFvq43c.png KibblesTasty false false false true true false 20200118 -->
